One of the worst rated movies on RT, but WTF, if wifey's gonna love it, she must be blonde! BTW, SecretMyth seems to have a French Connection. Since he's been posting rls info as an image, and copy/pasting from imdb... guess what, imdb detects your country and indicates that after the local release date. Look at any recent SM link under "DESCRIPTION" and you'll see "(France)" after the release date.
Not very bright for an uploader to reveal that type of thing, especially with HADOPI waiting round the corner! Note the grammatical mistakes as well... "after download finish"... should be "finishes"... he ain't no anglophone. At least the guy has finally twigged on resolution.

I never suggested what his actual nationality might be. He may well be Romanian... that doesn't stop him from being located in France. All I'm saying is that whoever copy/pasted the imdb info in SM's release descriptions was detected by imdb as being located in France. That's all.
